lastIntent:
refine(semantic-analyzer): Improve Claude prompt for semantic feature extraction

Enhanced the Claude API prompt in semantic-analyzer with:

- Added system message defining role as "semantic analysis engine"
- Structured prompt with clear sections: Input Context, Cluster Hint, Required Output
- Added evaluation criteria explaining domain inference logic
- Improved instructions for technologies, patterns, complexity assessment
- Better guidance on keyword extraction (exclude generic terms)
- Explicit JSON output instruction (no markdown blocks)

This improves the quality and consistency of semantic feature extraction
for vector embedding generation.
